name: Songs for a Hero - A Lenda do Herói
summary: A classic platform with a twist: A dynamic soundtrack and funny lyrics that sings the player's actions and responds to what is happening during the adventure.
info:
• 别名: 英雄之歌 伦达赫罗伊
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Platform
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2016年3月25日(Brazil), 2020年4月30日(English)
  • 官方网站: http://alendadoheroi.com.br/en/
  • 开发: Dumativa Game Studio, Castro Brothers
  • 发行: Dumativa Game Studio
